sentences.en: ...a government comprised mainly of the elite.
sentences.cn: …主要由精英组成的政府。

sentences.en: a struggle for power within the ruling elite
sentences.cn: 统治阶层内部的争权夺利

sentences.en: a struggle for power within the ruling elite
sentences.cn: 统治阶层内部的争权夺利

sentences.en: A tiny, educated elite profited from the misery of their two million fellow countrymen.
sentences.cn: 一小撮受过良好教育的精英分子从他们200万同胞的贫苦生活中获取利益。

sentences.en: Although the number of elite groups is small, they have enormous energy.
sentences.cn: 虽然精英群体人数很少, 但是其能量巨大.

sentences.en: an elite group of artists
sentences.cn: 一批出类拔萃的艺术家

sentences.en: As a member of an elite army hit squad, the army would send us out to do their dirty work for them.
sentences.cn: 作为特工小分队的一员，部队总会派我们去做他们不愿做的事。

sentences.en: As I know, the concept of civilian is opposition to elite.
sentences.cn: 在我脑中, 平民是相对于精英这个概念来说的.

sentences.en: Concentrate the natural elite, Dedicate to the Human Health.
sentences.cn: 浓缩植物精华, 缔造人类健康!

sentences.en: Dubai is the playground of the Middle East's elite.
sentences.cn: 迪拜是中东精英享乐的地方.

sentences.en: elite universities
sentences.cn: 精英大学

sentences.en: In the newspapers the elite simply argued with the elite.
sentences.cn: 在报纸上,上层人士只是与上层人士争辩而已.

sentences.en: Indeed, most elite universities don't even have an undergraduate business program.
sentences.cn: 的确, 多数名牌大学甚至不开设本科生的商科课程.

sentences.en: It must be said that the defence minister is a little bit more dovish than other people in the ruling elite.
sentences.cn: 需要指出的是国防大臣比上层统治集团中其他成员都要温和。

sentences.en: Nantah graduates form a large part of the Chinese cultural elite today.
sentences.cn: 今天,南洋大学毕业生是组成华文精英的中坚分子.

sentences.en: One of the goals of the campaign is to cut off the elite Republican Guard from its supplies.
sentences.cn: 该战役的目标之一就是切断精锐共和国卫队的补给。

sentences.en: Only the educational elite go 〔 goes 〕 to Oxford or Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 只有学业上的精英才能上牛津或剑桥大学.

sentences.en: Recruiters are welcomed even at elite universities.
sentences.cn: 招兵人员现在甚至在名牌大学也受到欢迎.

sentences.en: They were, by and large, a very wealthy, privileged elite.
sentences.cn: 他们基本上是一些非常有钱有势的精英。

sentences.en: You guys are supposed to be the business elite of this country.
sentences.cn: 人们总以为你们这些人是我国企业界中出类拨萃的人物.

words.tran_cn: 精英主义；杰出人物统治论

trans.tran_en: an elite group contains the best, most skilled or most experienced people or members of a larger group
a group of people who have a lot of power and influence because they have money, knowledge, or special skills
You can refer to the most powerful, rich, or talented people within a particular group, place, or society as the elite
